Title: Shenmue: The Movie
Description: ["Using scenes from the original SEGA Dreamcast game plus some extra made for the movie, Shenmue: the Movie details the events of the first game. After Ryo's father is murdered and a mysterious mirror taken, Ryo sets himself on a quest for revenge."]
Characters: ['Hazuki, Ryo', 'Harasaki, Nozomi', 'Hazuki, Iwao', 'Di, Lan', 'Johnson, Tom', 'Chen, Guizhang']
